Accordion

Accordions are expandable sections of content. Each section contains a summary element, and more body text when opened.

Accordions keep pages looking clean by hiding information that most people do not need to see.

Basic accordion

Example:

Title 1

A couple buttons are included inside this accordion to demonstrate that when the accordion is closed they are automatically not in the keyboard focus order but when the accordion opens they become the next available elements in the keyboard navigation sequence after the accordion's summary element.
Title 2 multiline lorem ipsum is useful because it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters
  • Anim pariatur cliche reprehenderit
  • moon officia aute, non cupidatat
Title 3 lorem ipsum dolor sit amet

moon officia aute, non cupidatat skateboard dolor brunch. Food truck quinoa nesciunt laborum eiusmod.

Brunch 3 wolf moon tempor, sunt aliqua put a bird on it squid single-origin coffee nulla assumenda

Accordion Side Menu

Accordion side menu is a list navigation with expandable sub navigation. For more information and examples visit side menu navigation page.

Example:

Accordion

Bootstrap Accordion Side Menu

Bootstrap accordion side menu is a vertical navigation component which apart from traditional, text links, might embed icons, dropdowns, images or even forms. For more information and examples visit side menu navigation page.

Example:

Link with sub-nav 1
Sub navigation link 1 Sub navigation link 2 Sub navigation link 3 Sub navigation link 4 Sub navigation link 5
Link with sub-nav 2
  • Sub-navigation list link 1
  • Sub-navigation list link 2
  • Sub-navigation list link 3
Regular link
Link with sub-nav 3
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
Regular link 2

Accordion List

Accordion lists are commonly used for things like FAQ's where the title exposes the description in an expanding menu fashion. Accordion List uses HTML5 roles, some ARIA properties, and IDs for accessibility.

Example:

  1. Consectetur Fusce Euismod

    Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper. Link.

  2. Pellentesque Justo Nibh Inceptos

    Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper.

  3. Nullam Nibh Fermentum Vehicula

    Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper.
